capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. I mean, she's just so iconic in the wizarding world, you know? And her lineage is indeed pure-blood, which is really impressive considering all that she's accomplished throughout her life. I think it's safe to say that she's one of the most confident and capable witches of our time.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's affiliation is indeed Hogwarts. I'm quite certain about that, and it's a fact that's widely known. It's not surprising to me that you'd agree with me on this one.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed a male character in the Harry Potter series. I've always found him to be quite an intriguing figure, with his complex and sometimes dark personality. His strict demeanor and sharp tongue can be intimidating at times, but there's also a depth to him that makes him more interesting than just a one-dimensional villain.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what activities does valeria enjoy doing in her free time?

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's got an incredible connection to that magic-wand of his. I mean, it's just so cool how he was able to tap into its power and become such a skilled wizard. I'm pretty certain that the wand chose him, you know? It's like they say, "the wand chooses the wizard." And I have to agree, Harry seems like the kind of person who would be worthy of wielding such an amazing tool.
